summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3984 for the improvement of 5th Avenue and 5th Avenue South, from Seneca Street to Jackson Street, by the installation of a street lighting system, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48471, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
